subject:
Re: Inconsistency between groupmap "Domain Admins"
	and	_lsa_add_acct_rights() checking
body:
On May 2, 2007, at 9:19 AM, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:

> Specify the full sid instead of just the rid to "net groupmap add".
> The HOWTO is for a Samba DC IIRC.

Thanks for the info.  Looks like you're right on the HOWTO.  I  
generalized it to AD.

Is what I'm trying to do unusual, or is it just obvious that I should  
know to specify the full sid?

> Hope this helps.

Thanks again.  Now I can get back to mucking with Cyrus imap...

-nik
